description:
### LateRide

Write a Java program to calculate the sum of the digits in the current time shown by the input provided in minutes past midnight (between 0 and 1439, inclusive).

Input: {An integer argument 'n', where 0 ≤ n ≤ 1439}
Output: {An integer which represents the sum of the digits in the current time.}

Example:

```js 
lateRide(808); // 14 
lateRide(1439); // 19 
```
